Most Popular Beaches In Andhra Pradesh That Should Be In Your Must Visit List Andhra Pradesh, one of the most beautiful states in South India has a long coastline with many beautiful beaches across many different coastal places like Vishakhapatnam, Nellore and Kakinada. Here is the list of 10 Top Beaches in Andhra Pradesh For A Perfect Beachside Vacation 1. Rishikonda Beach, Visakhapatnam 4.1 /5 The Rishikonda Beach is a stunning beach with pristine waters that is located on the coast of the Bay of Bengal in Vishakhapatnam, in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. APTDC, which is in charge of this natural beauty, has done a great job in looking after the beach and ensured that this natural attraction remains unharmed. The Rishikonda Beach is thus rightly named as the 'Jewel of the East Coast', owing to its essential and intact beauty. Read More 2. Bhavani Island, Vijayawada 4.1 /5 The largest island in the Krishna River, the Bhavani island is a favorite of all its visitors and home to numerous activities, to give you an ideal holiday experience. Read More 3. Manginapudi Beach, Machelipatnam 3.4 /5 Once served as major port, Manginapudi is currently a fishing village located on the shores of a beach nearly 11 km from Machelipatnam. This beautiful natural beach is unique for its black soil and also a natural bay comprising shallow water level. Read More 4. Mypadu Beach, Nellore 3.4 /5 Located about 22 km from the city of Nellore, Mypadu Beach is a calm and serene beach with slow waves and gentle breeze. The salient feature of the water body is sunrise that is not to be missed. Dolphin's nose, Visakhapatnam 3.4 /5 Very similar to a dolphins nose, this 174 m high rocky headland is situated in the south of Vizag . The nose seems to be protruding out towards the Bay of Bengal giving it a rather fascinating look. Read More 6. Yarada Beach, Visakhapatnam 3.1 /5 Situated on the coast of the Bay of Bengal and located close to Dolphin's nose, the Yarada beach is a quiet beach to chill by the waves, sip that tender coconut water and occasionally play in the water. Read More 7. Bheemilli beach, Visakhapatnam 3.1 /5 The long beautiful and pristine Bheemunipatnam Beach is located at the assemblage of Gosthani River and the Bay of Bengal. It also houses the remains of a 17th century fort and cemetery, reveling history dating back to the Dutch era. Read More 8. Ramakrishna Beach, Visakhapatnam 3.1 /5 One of the most popular beaches of Vishakapatnam, RK beach is a beach for to spend some relaxed time, enjoy strolls across the beach, sunbath and more. Read More 9. Gangavaram beach, Visakhapatnam 3.1 /5 One of the most beautiful beaches of the town, this one with palm trees and picture perfect sceneries attracts many film and TV serial makers. This beach with soft sands and cool breeze always provides a secluded atmosphere. Read More 10. Lawson's Bay Beach, Visakhapatnam 3.1 /5 Lawson's Bay beach is considered an extension of Ramakrishan beach more than often. It is a calm, serene and secluded stretch with lush greenery and whitish sands. The majestic sea with shallow crystal clear water and calm waves here is ideal for swimming, sun bathing and surfing.
